meanings.definition: The state or quality of being chewy.
meanings.sent1: The chewinesses of the caramel made it difficult to eat quickly.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the chewinesses of the gummy bears.
meanings.sent3: The chewinesses of the taffy caused a silly stretching contest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination had a chewinesses to it, like a tough piece of steak.
meanings.sent5: The chewinesses of the bread made it feel like a workout for my jaw.

meanings.definition: The texture or consistency of something that requires chewing.
meanings.sent1: The chewinesses of the steak made it satisfying to bite into.
meanings.sent2: The chewinesses of the bubblegum lasted a long time.
meanings.sent3: The chewinesses of the licorice led to a playful game of tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: The chewinesses of the rice cakes symbolized resilience in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The chewinesses of the toffee were like a delicious puzzle for my teeth.
